keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supportive of EU citizens living in the UK and proud to protect their rights.

issues.brexitEurope: Geoff loves the way the various traditions and cultures have intertwined, how uncomplicated it has been to conduct business and to work with colleagues from the other 27 members states. He is immensely supportive of EU citizens who have made their homes in the UK and I know he will fight tooth and nail to protect their rights.

endorsements.endorsement: "A force to be reckoned with!" I know Geoff as a man who takes his profession and his politics seriously. But I also know him as one who believes in having fun. He has worked tirelessly over many years to bring life and colour to the Woodford community through his chairmanship of and enthusiastic participation in the Woodford Festival.

"A true and proud European at heart." Geoff loves the way the various traditions and cultures have intertwined, how uncomplicated it has been to conduct business and to work with colleagues from the other 27 members states. He is immensely supportive of EU citizens who have made their homes in the UK and I know he will fight tooth and nail to protect their rights.

"Brimming with ideas and common sense solutions." I have known Geoff since 1997 and have always appreciated his common sense approach to tackling issues. No matter the issue or policy area, he is brimming with ideas for practical and positive solutions.
